summary: The implementation addresses REQ-1 by adding loadTournamentFromBackend functionality across multiple components. The changes include loading logic in TournamentListDialog, UserTournamentCard, and useTournamentStore with success toasts and proper deserialization. The implementation appears complete for the single requirement.

hallucinated_features.description: Match migration logic for stable source references in useTournamentStore
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request any migration logic or match source reference updates. The migrateMatchSources function and related source reference handling was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Navigation to setup view after loading tournament in useTournamentStore
hallucinated_features.reason: While the BuildRequest mentions 'populates on the tournament setup page', it does not explicitly request adding currentView: 'setup' navigation logic. However, this could be interpreted as necessary implementation detail to achieve the requirement, making this a borderline case.
